snippet.title: DOOM Eternal: The Ancient Gods Part 2 - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Watch the trailer for the second campaign expansion, Doom Eternal: The Ancient Gods - Part Two, which is the conclusion to the DOOM Slayer's saga.

Doom Eternal: The Ancient Gods - Part Two launches for PC, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and Stadia on March 18, 2021.

In Doom Eternal: The Ancient Gods - Part Two, you denied the gods and awoke an ancient evil. Now rally the scattered Sentinel armies, lay siege to the last bastion of Hell, break through the fortress walls, and face the Dark Lord himself. The soul of the universe hangs in the balance.

#IGN #DOOMEternal #Gaming
